speaker: President. –
english: President. – The next item is the report ( A6-0247/2007 ) by Jacek Protasiewicz, on behalf of the Committee on Employment and Social Affairs, on modernising labour law to meet the challenges of the 21st century ( 2007/2023(INI) ).
original: President. – The next item is the report ( A6-0247/2007 ) by Jacek Protasiewicz, on behalf of the Committee on Employment and Social Affairs, on modernising labour law to meet the challenges of the 21st century ( 2007/2023(INI) ).
agenda_item: Modernising labour law to meet the challenges of the 21st century (debate)
